Package view

Class MainFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
view.MainFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.InternalFrameListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, MenuBarListener
public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements MenuBarListener, javax.swing.event.InternalFrameListener
class that represents the main window of the application. Sets up the desktop pane in which all internal frames are displayed, as well as the application's menu bar.
Author:
Alexander Steinberg
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • MainFrame

      public MainFrame​(java.lang.String title) throws java.awt.HeadlessException
      constructor for the MainFrame class. Initializes the desktop pane in which all internal frames are displayed as well as the app's menu bar. Sets the initial dimensions of the main app window, minimal dimensions as well as to exit on close.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the main frame
      Throws:
      java.awt.HeadlessException

    • openFile

      public java.io.File openFile​(java.lang.String defaultfolder)
      Opens a file chooser for the user to pick a single pnml file to open in a new internal frame. If the file chooser instance needs to be newly created it opens in the passed default folder. (Otherwise it opens in whatever folder was last used.).
      Parameters:
      defaultfolder - the folder to open a newly created JFileChooser in
      Returns:
      the selected file

    • openFiles

      public java.io.File[] openFiles​(java.lang.String defaultfolder)
      Opens a file chooser for the user to pick a single pnml file to open in a new internal frame. If the file chooser instance needs to be newly created it opens in the passed default folder. (Otherwise it opens in whatever folder was last used.)
      Parameters:
      defaultfolder -
      Returns:
      the selected files

    • initializeInternalPetriFrame

      public void initializeInternalPetriFrame​(InternalPetriFrame internalFrame, Petrinet petrinet, AccessibilityGraph accessibilityGraph, java.lang.String name, org.graphstream.ui.view.ViewerListener viewerListener)
      Initialize an internal frame newly added to the main frame's desktop pane. The internal frame will display a single petrinet and corresponding accessibility graph.
      Parameters:
      petrinet - the petrinet displayed by the internal frame
      accessibilityGraph - the accessibilityGraph displayed by the internal frame
      name - the name of the internal frame

    • initializeInternalAnalysisFrame

      public void initializeInternalAnalysisFrame​(InternalPetriFrame internalFrame, Petrinet petrinet, java.lang.String title)
      Initialize an internal frame newly added to the main frame's desktop pane. The internal frame will display a batch analysis run in the passed petrinet.
      Parameters:
      internalFrame -
      petrinet -
      title -

    • addInternalFrame

      public InternalPetriFrame addInternalFrame​(java.lang.String name, InternalPetriFrameListener listener)
      Add a new internal frame to the main frame's desktop pane. The frame may either display a single petrinet and corresponding accessibility graph or a batch analysis. Sets the name as well as the passed InternalPetriFrameListener.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the InternalPetriFrame
      listener - the InternalPetriFrameListener to register with the internal frame
      Returns:
